name: Snake VS Blocks 3D
description:
Swipe to grow your tiny snek worm into a swole snake that can smash brick blocks!

Guide your worm snake to smash blocks in your way. Feed your cannibal snake with weakling snek worms to grow it into the biggest, meanest snake on the block!

Balls VS Blocks? Snake VS Blocks!

Get your snake ready for a showdown!

Train your snake worms against all sorts of brick blocks, and grow your snake into a master of brick breaking arts!

Game Features:

* Intuitive, simple swipe control
* Snake style growth
* FREE to play
* Endless game play

Getting a tiny snek worm is easy, but think you can get a swole snake? Slither away with your block eating worms and grow your worms into the strongest block smash snake!


Will your snake worm be in the top percentage of snake worms?
